Name: Scarlet Tower
About the game: Starting Hunt during the day, be hunted during the NIGHT! Fight bizarre monsters that will terrify you at night! Strengthen your hero by collecting relics, familiars from around the world. Day & Night Cycle Look for relics and vendors that only spawn at night. Weather Events Be prepared!
